column4: Hello, I installed ubuntu moments ago on this laptop, and it freezes right after I enter my user/pass in the screen, and plays that sound with the ubuntu splash
I checked /var/log/messages and I don't see anything
try     grep EE /var/log/Xorg.0.log
i get that error too, i wouldnt sweat that one
Well any thoughts on how to fix or debug ths?
how far does it go? like u get the ubuntu splash screen and all?
how many of the programs load on that script?  all of them?
does it freeze on any of them?   did u have any complications during the install?
nothing loads
yeah there is, like 5 of them are default... hmm id say its some kinda problem with gnome, but i couldnt even guess at it
what r u using now?  bitchx?
irssi
try running a    sudo apt-get update
I *just* finished the install, and if I was paying attention correctly, it spent hours doing that
it still needs to upgrade more stuff then      like another 60 megs worth for me at least
ur install took hours?   are u on highspeed?
I ran the update, to no avail
why did it take u so long to install?
because I'm on wireless
ahh i c
i really dont know what to tell ya      u can try a    grep EE /var/log/*
there was none at all?
just the DRI thing I said earlier
